job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer (Go)

The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend development, API creation, and data ingestion services using Go. While it mentions a 'lean team' and 'rapidly scaling', there is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies. The core responsibilities and technologies described align with traditional software engineering rather than any of the AI-focused profiles.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'backend development', 'delivering product features', and 'developing backend APIs', which are core components of traditional software development.
The phrase 'developing backend APIs' directly relates to building the interfaces for backend services, a key software development task.
The mention of 'data collection and ingestion services' points to the foundational tasks of gathering and processing data, which falls under data engineering.
The phrase 'operate efficiently and pragmatically' indicates a focus on practical, results-oriented problem-solving.
The statement 'everyone's voice is heard' suggests an environment that values open communication and collaboration within the team.
The phrase 'plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions' implies a role where initiative, ownership, and driving change are encouraged.
job_tasks.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions

soft_skills.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
